mapper.select: select vsa.recruit_no, vsa.member_no, vsa.motivate, m.id, m.name, m.mail_address from voluntary_service_applicate vsa, member m where vsa.member_no=m.member_no and recruit_no=#{value}
select vao.recruit_no, m.member_no, m.id, m.name, m.mail_address from voluntary_applicant_ok vao, member m where vao.member_no=m.member_no and recruit_no=#{value}
select member_no, id, name, mail_address from member where member_no=#{value}

select board_no, title, field, location, age, volunteering_start_date, volunteering_end_date from(select board_no, title, field, location, age, volunteering_start_date, volunteering_end_date, CEIL(rownum/5) AS page from(select board_no, title, field, location, age, volunteering_start_date, volunteering_end_date from(select cb.board_no, cb.title, cb.field, cb.location, cb.age,volunteering_start_date,volunteering_end_date from confirm c , confirm_board cb where c.board_no=cb.board_no and c.member_no=#{memberNo} ) order by board_no desc ) ) where page=#{pageNo}
select count(*) from confirm where member_no=#{value}
